alert.note: Alert for Southeast Fayette; Southeast Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 10:10PM EST until January 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional accumulations will be less than an inch with areas of black ice developing. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Fayette and Southeast Nicholas Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, to 1 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 4 AM to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
